ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well but that was a necro robe? Someone else here said that the necro robes are class specific... (necros only). What about the other robes? They aren t
ygData.messageBody:
On 20 Jul, dennis wojdyla wrote:
> From: "dennis wojdyla" <dwojdyla@...>
>
> Well i can tell you the /consent will not work, i have a DE Necro and has a
> SR apren robe, and i died to guards, when my inv wore off, inside riverdale.
> I consented to my friends and he could loot everything but my robe.

Well but that was a necro robe? Someone else here said that the necro
robes are class specific... (necros only). What about the other robes?
They aren't dark elf specific and at least wiz, mag and enc can wear
them...
